quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: Central China Securities Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: Central China Securities Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: Central China Securities Co Ltd is a China-based company mainly engaged in the financial related businesses. The Company has eight segments. The Securities Brokerage segment is engaged in the security trading and brokering business. The Futures Brokerage segment is engaged in the future trading, brokering business and relevant services. The Margin Trading and Securities Lending segment is engaged in the margin trading and securities lending business. The Investment Banking segment provides corporate financing and related advisory services. The Proprietary Trading segment provides financial products trading business. The Investment and Asset Management segment covers the direct investments, funds related business, portfolio management, maintenance business and investment advisory services. The Overseas Business segment is engaged in the broking, margin financing, investment and financial planning business. The Other Businesses segment provides headquarter related operations business.
